Text: Oñ o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo mi kakini,

O̩ma one̩, kache̩ bʼamadide Israe̩l oji ma, kache̩, kʼe̩ ka ñwu ma, owñ chʼamadide le̩, kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩ kakini, Atogwo ñw amadide Israe̩l ki kʼuje̩wñ ñw o̩la-ma je̩! I dukpe̩ kʼamadide kʼi kʼuje̩wñ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩ egini je̩ n?
Me̩ je̩ ula-wñ, me̩ la nʼedudu-wñ chʼukpo ubʼo̩la ma-me̩, me̩ fʼabo ki yoyo kpa, me̩ muda kʼuje̩wñ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩ egini je̩ n.
Me̩ dʼukpahiu ñw aboga n, me̩ la fʼo̩ga e-kʼi chʼo̩ga che n, me̩ la fʼachiku ki guche̩ ji n, me̩ la dʼe-ku ma ne tinyo̩ dabiwa n, e-kʼi lenyo̩ me̩ la tejane̩ n; me̩ muda ne̩ ma kpʼukpahiu kpʼafuma.
Taku ma fiatuka, ukpe̩ kʼadide-ma ma de̩ n; ma la mud uje̩wñ ñw ame̩wñ iñmi oko du, oñ ma mukpatuka.
Ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini tale oj uwo uwo ki gbo̩gba chaka, kpʼoj otete okoke du, ochochi, ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini mukpatuka jʼeju ile̩ ugbo du; i la nʼe̩ne̩ du kʼi tejane̩ kpʼetene ma n.
Todule̩ ame̩ amadide ala le̩, me̩ gbʼo̩la Jihofa:

Oji-mi, Ondu Jihofa aka-i, todabu kʼame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini mud e̩wñ aluje̩, kʼame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini mud uje̩wñ ñw ame̩wñ iñmi oko chaka, todabu kʼadide ma de̩ n, kʼamadide e-mi ma la tejane̩ ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini n, chai edʼuje̩wñ ñw o̩la-ma oñ amadide dʼuje̩wñ ñw o̩la-ma ku ma ma la kʼuje̩wñ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩ e-mi egini je̩ n;
todule̩, ame̩ amadide ala, me̩ gbʼo̩la Jihofa kakini,

abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Go, omi chʼe̩nagwunyʼamadide le̩; natene ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini o̩wo̩-ma, oñ nache ku ma we ekʼuje̩wñ ñw ame̩wño̩re̩ egini le je̩; amadide le̩ lañʼakʼuje̩wñ ñw o̩la-ma ge̩ n; naño̩ gba ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini bʼalu-ma te̩, kʼama ki we echʼuje̩wñ ñwu ma.
Todu abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Go, omi onugo owñ chʼomi-i, atejane̩ ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini, oñ natene ugbo ku ma jo.
Alu kʼadide atene abujo̩ e-wñ o̩jo̩ kʼi dʼef ame̩wño̩re̩-wñ egini ku ma mukpatuka, abe̩le̩ omi atene ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini; oñ nagba ma bʼugbo du ku ma kpatuka ru o̩jo̩ kʼomi du kʼane̩ la chubi te̩.

Omi la ako ma kwef amone̩ amone̩ dufu wa, kʼu ño̩ ko ma kwʼojane̩ ojane̩ wa jo̩, tak u nako ma wʼoj ane̩ e-ma onugo; tak omi akʼuje̩wñ ñwu ma je̩ oj uwo uwo Israe̩l o̩la o̩cha o̩cha omi-wñ, kpʼugbo du kʼone̩ dodo ane̩ le̩.
Omi akʼije̩ ki nyo̩ ñwu ma je̩. Iga-ma la adʼoj uwo uwo Israe̩l ki gbo̩gba: o̩mo̩ ma adachi jo̩ ef iga o̩me̩me̩le̩; ma ajo̩ oj uwo uwo Israe̩l ajʼije̩ ugbo kʼi ra nyo̩nyo̩.
Omi onugo achʼadide ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini oñ naje̩ ñwu ma dachi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.

U la atene e-ki lenyo̩ le̩, oñ nakʼe-ku ma ne tinyo̩ dabiwa, u la aji achiku ki muguche̩, oñ nadʼukpahiu ñw e-kʼi chʼo̩ga; u muda ako abo ki yoyo kpʼabo ki gbiti kpabie̩ rinyo̩; omi akʼije̩ ñwu ma je̩ lʼo̩na kʼoji ajo̩ o̩kpakpa ka.
I la chʼe-me̩, O, ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini abu kʼOndu Jihofa ka de̩, kakini, Go, omi akʼajo̩ agbagba e̩wño̩re̩ egini kpai e̩wño̩re̩ egini kpʼagbagba amokolo kpʼamobuko̩.
Ejo̩ ugbo ije̩ ki nyo̩ aje̩ chʼe̩wñ ke̩ke̩ eju-me̩, ku me̩ ño̩ nʼe̩re̩-me̩ fʼe̩bo̩bo̩ ije̩-me̩ kpetili mane̩? ku me̩ fʼomi ki de̩ gbaa ñmo̩, tak ame̩ nʼe̩re̩-me̩ fʼe̩bo̩bo̩-wñ bu?
I chʼe-ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini, e-kʼame̩ nʼe̩re̩-me̩ te̩mane̩, ama je̩. E-kʼame̩ nʼe̩re̩-me̩ bu, oñ ama ñmo̩.
Todule̩ abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka ñwu ma de̩ kakini, Go, omi de̩, omi akajo̩ agbagba e̩wño̩re̩ egini ki yoyo kpʼe̩wñ o̩re̩ egini ki gbo̩gbe̩.
Todabu ku me̩ nʼakolo kpʼojika ake̩che̩, ku me̩ la nʼigba igba-me̩ aro̩dʼabo̩ kʼo̩ga dʼo̩la-ma, gbogbo taku me̩ fʼuma fiatuka rʼo̩do̩da;
todule̩ omi ajadu ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini, ma ñʼachʼe̩wñ aluje̩ ge̩ n; oñ nakajo̩ agbagba e̩wñ ore̩ egini kpai e̩wñ o̩re̩ egini.
Tak u nadʼadide okate dago kʼi ne ma, owñ le̩ akʼuje̩wñ ma je̩, owñ chʼadu-mi Defid; owñ la akʼuje̩wñ ñwu ma je̩, owñ la achʼadide-ma.
Tak omi, Jihofa, achʼO̩jo̩-me̩, oñ adu-mi Defid achʼidachi ef uma; omi, Jihofa ka me̩.
Tak omi akpʼalo ure̩do̩ kpʼama, oñ naje̩ ñw ame̩wñ iñmi ki bie̩ne̩ ki takpa bʼane̩-i te̩; tak ama agugu jʼaje̩tachi to̩ko̩o̩, ma la adachi alolu efoko.
Oñ nache kʼama kpʼuña uña ki donyʼuwo-mi daka ki mud e̩nyo̩ kʼO̩jo̩ adʼu ñw one̩; u la aje̩ ñw omi ki lo̩ iko-wñ; e̩nyo̩ awa dab omi ki alo̩ gwo̩gwo̩-gwo̩.

Oli egbili la arʼe̩ro-wñ, ane̩-ile̩ la arʼo̩je̩, oñ ma ajo̩ ane̩-ma to̩koo̩. Taku ma ama ka kʼomi Jihofa de̩, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼu fʼoli uno̩lo̩-ma guche̩, kʼu la mʼuma gba kwef o̩wo̩ abo ku ma ko ma chʼadu.
Ma ñʼachʼe̩wñ aluje̩ ñw abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ge̩ n. Ame̩wñ iñmi ile̩-i lañʼako ma je̩ ge̩ n; ma muda ajo̩ to̩ko̩o̩, oñ e̩ne̩ du anyʼuma okpo n.
Tak omi adʼe̩wñ oko ki nʼuwohi gbe̩ kʼi atiga ñwu ma, ukpo̩ta la ñʼakpa ma ane̩ le̩ ge̩ n, anyo̩ abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ñʼanʼuma oji ge̩ n.
Tak ama ama ka kʼomi, Jihofa O̩jo̩-ma, dʼugbo ma, ka kʼama abo unyi Israe̩l, chʼabo e-mi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Oñ ame̩, ame̩wño̩re̩-mi egini, owñ chʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini ku me̩ jo̩ oki-je̩-mi, la chʼamone̩, omi, O̩jo̩-me̩ de̩, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
